page.title: 02KINGSWOOD C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: There are are 87 children at Kingswood School in 3 classes: 29 9-11 year olds, 28 6-9 year olds and 32 4-6 year olds. There are 10 adults: a Head Teacher, 2 full-time & 1 part-time teachers, a secretary, welfare assistant,cleaner and 3 dinner ladies,two of whom help the children at dinner break and one who serves out the dinners. There is a staffroom & 3 classrooms, two of them are big & old and one is a terrapin classroom which is smaller and newer. There is a small library with a television. There are two cloakrooms. Outside there is a small grass area & a playground with games painted on and some play equipment: 3 concrete tunnels, a climbing frame and a scramble net attached to it. There are two lavatory buildings outside,one for the staff and one for the children.
